name: Cell Voltra Running Shoes
description:
Speed to spare

With its sleek, streamlined design and advanced footwear technology, this shoe is designed to help you get wherever you're going with speed, grace and style.


    * Features:Mesh upper for breathability
    * Innovative dual-shelf design to reduce impact and enhance rebound
    * PUMA tenCELL heel unit for maximum shock absorption
    * Sockliner with external shank for extra support
    * Durable solid rubber outsole with enhanced traction

name: Speeder Mesh Runnung Shoes
description:
Super and groovy

An homage to the age when bangs were feathered and moustaches and chest hair were allowed to roam free. This jogger's disco colors will help you get your groove on. Sorry, key club membership not included.


    * Features:Leather and mesh upper for long-lasting wear and breathability
    * Cushioned midsole for comfort and support
    * Rubber outsole for stability and traction

name: Racer L
description:
Think big

Where do you see yourself wearing these shoes? We picture you driving a Ferrari convertible somewhere in Europe. Let's say the Swiss autobahn. The top's down, of course, and the wind blows back your scarf as your gorgeous companion runs her fingers through your hair. That's the image in our head, anyway.


    * Features:Leather upper for long-lasting wear
    * Fashion stripes on side of heel for a sophisticated flair
    * Durable rubber outsole
